targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bat_soc")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sol_pwr")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "to_bat")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ac_power")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "to_grid")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "to_house")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

multiplyByX = (x, tables=<-) => tables
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * x}))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -30y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "to_grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] < 0.0)
  |> multiplyByX(x: -${Cost}/1000.0/${QueryFrequency})
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yield_today")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0.0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yield_total")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -31d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yield_today")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "to_grid_total")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

multiplyByX = (x, tables=<-) => tables
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * x}))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -30y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "to_grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0.0)
  |> multiplyByX(x: ${Gain}/1000.0/${QueryFrequency})
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sol_pwr")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Leistung gesamt")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "S")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "W1")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "W2")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "O")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yield_today" or r["_field"] == "to_grid_today")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0.0)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, offset: ${TZ_OFFSET})

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

multiplyByX = (x, tables=<-) => tables
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * x}))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "to_grid")
  |> set(key: "_measurement", value: "to_grid_cost")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] < 0.0)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, offset: ${TZ_OFFSET})
  |> multiplyByX(x: -${Cost}/1000.0/${QueryFrequency})

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")


multiplyByX = (x, tables=<-) => tables
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * x}))

  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "to_grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0.0)
  |> set(key: "_measurement", value: "to_grid_gain")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, offset: ${TZ_OFFSET})
  |> multiplyByX(x: ${Gain}/1000.0/${QueryFrequency})

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -12mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telegraf_message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bat_soc")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> set(key: "_measurement", value: "median_soc")
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false, offset: ${TZ_OFFSET})
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: median, createEmpty: false, offset: ${TZ_OFFSET})
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> set(key: "_measurement", value: "max_soc")
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false, offset: ${TZ_OFFSET})
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: max, createEmpty: false, offset: ${TZ_OFFSET})
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)

  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> set(key: "_measurement", value: "min_soc")
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false, offset: ${TZ_OFFSET})
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: min, createEmpty: false, offset: ${TZ_OFFSET})
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
